About Me

I am Chauncey Liu (Chengxian Liu), a student of Simon Fraser University in Burnaby, Vancouver, Canada. Before that, I studied at Zhejiang University, China. Actually I am still on my way seeking for my interested area in computer science but currently shows a tendency to CG and Networking.
